## Disclaimer
Protocol document of down-grading process of dplyr on zws-server.


## Test
The down-grade was tested on beverin. 


## Command for Down-grade

```
R -e "remove.packages('dplyr');remotes::install_url(url = 'https://cran.r-project.org/src/contrib/Archive/dplyr/dplyr_0.8.4.tar.gz', upgrade = 'never');packageVersion('dplyr')"
```


## Version Check

```
R -e "lapply(c('dplyr','remotes'), function(x) packageVersion(x))"
```
